languages.text: "Значит, раньше губернатор такого благоволения к тебе не оказывал? Может, и назначение в сопровождающие к Вольному Торговцу тоже было неожиданным?"
"So, the governor has never favoured you like this before? Perhaps the appointment to escort the Rogue Trader also came as a surprise?"
languages.original_text: "Значит, раньше губернатор такого благоволения к тебе не оказывал? Может, и назначение в сопровождающие к Вольному Торговцу тоже было неожиданным?"

traits.locale_text: "So the governor has never favoured you like this before? Perhaps the appointment to escort the Rogue Trader also came as a surprise?"
"So, the governor has never favoured you like this before? Perhaps the appointment to escort the Rogue Trader also came as a surprise?"
"So, the governor has never favoured you like this before? Perhaps the appointment to escort the Rogue Trader also came as a surprise?"
"So, the governor has never favoured you like this before? Perhaps the appointment to escort the Rogue Trader also came as a surprise?"
"So, the governor has never favoured you like this before? Perhaps the appointment to escort the Rogue Trader also came as a surprise?"

languages.text: "Ihr standet also noch nie so sehr in der Gunst des Gouverneurs? Kam Eure Berufung als Begleitung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} auch überraschend?"
languages.original_text: "So, the governor has never favoured you like this before? Perhaps the appointment to escort the Rogue Trader also came as a surprise?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr standet also noch nie so sehr in der Gunst des Gouverneurs? Kam Eure Berufung als Begleitung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} auch überraschend?"

languages.text: « Si je comprends bien, le gouverneur ne vous avait encore jamais accordé ce genre de faveur ? Avez-vous également trouvé cela surprenant qu'il vous demande d'escorter {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ? »
languages.original_text: "So, the governor has never favoured you like this before? Perhaps the appointment to escort the Rogue Trader also came as a surprise?"

traits.locale_text: « Si je comprends bien, le gouverneur ne vous avait encore jamais accordé ce genre de faveur ? Avez-vous également trouvé cela surprenant qu'il vous demande d'escorter {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ? »

languages.text: “你是说，总督之前根本不像现在这样青睐你，是吗？陪同行商浪人的任务，你也没想过会居然由你负责吧？”
languages.original_text: "So, the governor has never favoured you like this before? Perhaps the appointment to escort the Rogue Trader also came as a surprise?"

traits.locale_text: “你是说，总督之前根本不像现在这样青睐你，是吗？陪同行商浪人的任务，你也没想过会居然由你负责吧？”

languages.text: «Entonces, ¿el gobernador nunca la ha favorecido así antes? El que le nombraran para escoltar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, ¿también fue una sorpresa?».
languages.original_text: "So, the governor has never favoured you like this before? Perhaps the appointment to escort the Rogue Trader also came as a surprise?"

traits.locale_text: «Entonces, ¿el gobernador nunca la ha favorecido así antes? El que le nombraran para escoltar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, ¿también fue una sorpresa?».

languages.text: 「そうか、総督がこんな風にお前を可愛がったことは今まで一度もなかったんだな？ローグトレーダーの案内役に任命されたのも驚きだったんじゃねえか？」
languages.original_text: "So, the governor has never favoured you like this before? Perhaps the appointment to escort the Rogue Trader also came as a surprise?"

traits.locale_text: 「そうか、総督がこんな風にお前を可愛がったことは今まで一度もなかったんだな？ローグトレーダーの案内役に任命されたのも驚きだったんじゃねえか？」

languages.text: "Vali seni daha önce hiç böyle kayırmadı mı? Belki de Hür Tacir'e eşlik etme görevi de sana sürpriz olmuştur..."
languages.original_text: "So, the governor has never favoured you like this before? Perhaps the appointment to escort the Rogue Trader also came as a surprise?"

traits.locale_text: "Vali seni daha önce hiç böyle kayırmadı mı? Belki de Hür Tacir'e eşlik etme görevi de sana sürpriz olmuştur..."
